description:
"Bunker Life" is a survival game to get through the Apocalypse.

・You need to explore various areas to obtain a new card.
・Acquire vehicles and expand your searchable range.
・Meet colleagues of various professions and join forces to survive.
・The combination of colleagues can also have a big impact on survival.
・Find out the characteristics of your colleague who may be dangerous.
・He may have a dangerous personality such as binge eating, alcoholism, or a killer.
・Find the causes of the Apocalypse that change every time.
・You may get a big hint on how to survive.
・Clean the bunker by periods.
・The more polluted the bunker, the more dangerous your health.
・Experience over 500 different events.
・40 endings are available.
・Find parodies of famous films.
・It shows many films based on apocalypse.

If the game is difficult, you don't need to worry.
After a failure, you can restart the card by inheriting the used card.
If you play over and over again, a touching ending is waiting for you!

Prologue
It was a bunker where I woke up.
In it, the things necessary for survival were prepared.
But it seems that I can’t last long with these alone. 
I have to get what I need at all costs.
Only then did I become curious.
What happened to the world outside the bunker?
name: Bunker Life
